countdown.name: countdown
countdown.description: The bot pings you when the timer finishes.

rps.name: rps
rps.description: A command that means you can play rock paper scissors with the bot.

maths.name: maths
maths.description: A command that you can give the bot so that the bot can give you an answer.

roll.name: roll
roll.description: A command that chooses a random person from the server, useful for giveaways.

purge.name: purge
purge.description: A command that deletes a certain amount of messages in the current channel.

version.name: version
version.description: A command that tells you the patch notes for the most recent update.

kick.name: kick
kick.description: A command that kicks the mentioned user.

ban.name: ban
ban.description: A command that bans the mentioned user.

mute.name: mute
mute.description: A command that mutes the mentioned user.

unmute.name: unmute
unmute.description: A command that unmutes the mentioned user.

announce.name: announce
announce.description: A command that shows asks the author questions about the announcement and then sends it.

load.name: load
load.description: A command that loads an extension provided.

unload.name: unload
unload.description: A command that unloads an extension provided.

categories.name: categories
categories.description: A command that shows you the announcement categories required for the announce command.

info.name: info
info.description: A command that shows you information about the mentioned user.

support.name: support
support.description: A command that invites you to the support server.

invite.name: invite
invite.description: A command that gives you the invite link to invite the bot.

config.name: config
config.description: A command that changes the configuration for the bot on your server.

profile.name: profile
profile.description: A command that contacts the MN API so that you can get information about your own profile.

leafy.name: leafy
leafy.description: A command that checks the leafy API to see if it is working correctly.

funfact.name: funfact
funfact.description: A command that gets a random funfact from the MN API.

verify.name: verify
verify.description: A command that verifies you and gives you a role.

duty.name: duty
duty.description: A command that you can use to manage statuses for staff members.
